website_summaries.verdict: Trendy gladiator sandal for summer sightseeing.
pros: Laces mean the fit can be customized, with options for tying at the ankle
Soft leather and suede has a quality feel
cons: Can be a pain to get on and off

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: I love Dolce Vita shoes and this beautiful sandal is no exception. It's super cute and the added cushion makes it very comfortable without any insole. Lace up makes it a perfect fit for my somewhat narrow feet. Quality is awesome too. It matches with jeans, skirts, shorts, dress up or down, just perfect. The length of laces are also great to tie in front or in back for different styling. I will be wearing this one all through summer season! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: sp1cyninja

customer_reviews.title: Changed design- Hard to get off/on
customer_reviews.text: They changed the design of these- hence the 3 stars. They used to zip in the back so you didn't have to untie them- these are cute but a pain to get off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Style Mama

customer_reviews.title: Soft flats!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals. Comfortable cushiony footbed, won't cause any issues with all day walking. The suede/leather is very soft - no hard or rough edges to rub blisters. The string tie is also soft, and doesn't sit funny or crooked like harder leather styles.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are super cute, but they seem to run 1/2 size big. I think a 9 would have fit better than the 9.5. Since the sandals are somewhat narrow and hug my feet, it's not that big of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: NowIGetIt

customer_reviews.title: Super cute sandals
customer_reviews.text: Super cute sandals! I could've ordered one size smaller and they would have fit better. But they are high-quality and I get lots of compliments on them - definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sandal!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite shoes to wear! They go with everything (the cheetah print) and are SO comfortable. I always get compliments on them as well!!!! Want them in every color :)
customer_reviews.author: CC Merutka

customer_reviews.title: These are the cutest most comfortable shoes! I wear and 8 1/2 but always ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest most comfortable shoes! I wear and 8 1/2 but always order a size down on sandals and these fit perfectly at an 8! love love love them! Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Triple Heart Design

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, not a thick sole but I managed to walk great distances no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Squiggly Biggins

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Comfy
customer_reviews.text: True to Size and very cute, They Look Fancy 😍
customer_reviews.author: Perla Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Laces fit well and the color is neutral and blended ...
customer_reviews.text: Laces fit well and the color is neutral and blended with my skin tone. Price was reasonable compared to other retailers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are so cute and comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so cute and comfortable!!! They easily became my favorite sandals! I always get so many compliments when I wear them. They are perfect for summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't sleep on these sandals.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous Gladiator sandals. Fit TTS. Wish I could have them in every color!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Y

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes from Nordstrom a year ago and they were great. I was looking to repurchase for this summer. Unfortunately, the pair I received from Amazon was made quite differently. It was noticeably narrower to the point of discomfort. Also, the laces are not the material pictured and make the shoe look cheap. I returned. Did anyone else find the sandal uncomfortably narrow and the laces not as pictured? Really wish they worked out.
customer_reviews.author: KimD

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy
customer_reviews.text: They're not that comfortable. They give me blisters. But they're super cute so I still wear them
customer_reviews.author: Kandis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute -Almond suede best color
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I bought these originally from Nordstrom and lost them while on vacation. I’m so happy to have found these on Amazon. I bought almond suede in 7.5 and they fit perfectly and look exactly like my original sandals. I will say the strings feel a bit different compared to my last pair but overall these are the exact same thing. Highly suggest almond suede color it goes with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

product_meta.title: Dolce Vita Women's Jasmyn Gladiator Sandal
